description.value: When this character makes a ranged attack with a Plasma Weapon with the Maximal Quality on Maximal Settings, they add an additional +2 to its Damage, Penetration, and Blast Quality. (for a total of +1d10+2 Damage, +4 Penetration, and +4 Blast)
